useCases.title: Explore and Understand New Repository
useCases.description: Read a repository and understand the codebase.
useCases.prompt: I need to understand this codebase: [repo path]. Give me an overview of the project structure, main components, and how they interact. Identify the entry points and key files I should focus on first.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Build Complete Feature from Scratch
useCases.description: Build a new feature for your app based on your existing codebase.
useCases.prompt: I need to build [feature description] in my project at [project path]. Create all necessary files, implement the feature, and integrate it with existing code. Show me what you're building as you go.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Analyze My Data File
useCases.description: Make sense of a data file that you have.
useCases.prompt: Look for the file called 'filename' in my [folder]. Analyze this file and tell me: what data it contains, key patterns or insights, and create a simple summary report.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Set Up Development Environment
useCases.description: Set up your development environment, install dependencies and configure required tools.
useCases.prompt: Set up a complete development environment for [technology stack] on my machine. Install dependencies, configure tools, and create a sample project to verify everything works.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Clean Up Unused Code
useCases.description: Scan your codebase to find unused imports, dead functions, and redundant code that can be safely removed.
useCases.prompt: Analyze this project directory: [project root path]. Identify unused imports and dead code in this codebase.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Understand React Component Architecture
useCases.description: Get a clear breakdown of how your React component works, including props flow, state management, and dependencies.
useCases.prompt: Find this React component: [component name/path]. Analyze this React component and explain its data flow and dependencies
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Build Data Processing Pipeline
useCases.description: Creates automated systems that continuously collect and process data (like tracking competitor prices daily).
useCases.prompt: Create an automated system to [collect/process] data from [source]. Set up the pipeline to run regularly and save results to organized files on my computer.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Organise my Downloads folder
useCases.description: Organise messy downloads folder into relevant subfolders.
useCases.prompt: Analyze my Downloads folder and organize all files into subfolders by type (Documents, Images, Videos, Archives, etc.). Show me what you're doing and create a summary of what was organized. Open the new folder when you are done.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Build Personal Finance Tracker
useCases.description: Create a complete web application from scratch and launch it locally in your browser.
useCases.prompt: Build me a personal finance tracker web app that lets me [add expenses, categorize spending, see monthly summaries]. Create all the necessary HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. Set up a local server and open the app in my browser when it's ready. Make it look professional and fully functional. Open it in browser when ready.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Create Automated Email Newsletter
useCases.description: Create an automated content for email newsletters.
useCases.prompt: Create an automated system that compiles content from [these sources] and generates a weekly newsletter. Set it up to create HTML email templates and organize them in folders on my computer.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Automated Competitor Research
useCases.description: Automate weekly competitive research and store your notes in one place.
useCases.prompt:
I want to create an automated competitor tracking system. Help me set up:
System Setup:

A folder structure for competitor research on my Desktop
Template files for competitor profiles
A weekly research workflow 

My main competitors are: [list your competitors]
Automation Goal: I want to simply write "Weekly competitor research" in a Claude chat, and have Claude automatically:

Search all my competitors for news/updates from the past 7 days
Use deep research
Analyze findings strategically
Provide specific action items
Create a new weekly report file and save it to the competitor folder on my computer

After setup, provide:

Step-by-step instructions for the weekly workflow
The exact prompt/command I should use each week
How to ensure the files are automatically organized in the right folders

Key Requirements:

Everything organized in one place on my computer
Minimal manual work each week
Strategic analysis, not just raw data
Actionable insights I can act on immediately
Clear guidance on when to use weekly vs deep research
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Learn from Codebase Patterns
useCases.description: Discover interesting coding patterns and techniques you can learn from existing projects.
useCases.prompt: Summarize this codebase at [project path] and highlight the most interesting patterns or techniques I could learn from.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Identify Refactoring Opportunities
useCases.description: Find areas in your codebase that need improvement or refactoring.
useCases.prompt: Identify potential areas for improvement or refactoring in this codebase at [project path], highlighting parts that appear fragile, complex, or hard to maintain.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Analyze Error Handling Strategy
useCases.description: Understand and document the error handling and logging approaches used in your project.
useCases.prompt: What kind of error handling and logging strategies does the project at [project path] use? Document the patterns and suggest improvements.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Implement GitHub Issue
useCases.description: Create a working implementation for a specific GitHub issue or feature request.
useCases.prompt: Implement a first draft for GitHub issue #[number] in project at [project path]. Read the issue requirements and create the necessary code changes.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Set Up New Project Structure
useCases.description: Create complete project setup with standard structure and configs.
useCases.prompt: Set up a new [language] project with standard structure, configs, and development tools ready to go.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Create Knowledge Base Folder
useCases.description: Create a strucutre for your local knowledge base.
useCases.prompt:
I want to create a personal knowledge base by organizing copies of my existing files on this computer. Please help me:

-Check my current file structure using Desktop Commander to understand what types of files and content I have

-Ask targeted follow-up questions about my goals and preferences before proposing an organizational system

-Create a well-structured knowledge base folder on my Desktop with appropriate subfolders

-Copy (never move or delete) relevant files into this new organizational structure.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Auto-Generate API Documentation
useCases.description: Transform your API endpoints into comprehensive documentation with all parameters, responses, and examples.
useCases.prompt: Find this API file: [file name/path]. Generate documentation for this API endpoint including all parameters and responses.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Technical Debt Assessment & Roadmap.
useCases.description: Get a comprehensive analysis of technical debt with prioritized remediation plan and effort estimates.
useCases.prompt: Analyze this entire project: [project root path]. Analyze technical debt across the project and create a remediation roadmap.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Visualize Microservices Communication
useCases.description: Create visual diagrams showing how your microservices interact, data flows, and potential bottlenecks.
useCases.prompt: Analyze all files in this directory: [project/services directory path]. Create a visual map of how these microservices communicate with each other.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Create Team Onboarding Documentation
useCases.description: Generate comprehensive onboarding guide for new developers including setup, architecture overview, and contribution guidelines.
useCases.prompt: Analyze this entire project: [project root path]. Create onboarding guide for new developers joining this project.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Optimize Docker Setup
useCases.description: Generate production-ready Docker configuration tailored to your application's specific requirements and dependencies.
useCases.prompt: Analyze this project: [project root path]. Generate Docker configuration optimized for this application's requirements.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Document System Architecture
useCases.description: Get a comprehensive overview of your system's architecture and design patterns.
useCases.prompt: Describe the main pieces of this system's architecture at [project path]. Explain how components interact and highlight the key design patterns used.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Audit Security Mechanisms
useCases.description: Identify and document all security measures implemented in your codebase.
useCases.prompt: What security mechanisms are in place in this project at [project path]? Analyze authentication, authorization, data protection, and potential vulnerabilities.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Generate Dev Onboarding Guide
useCases.description: Create step-by-step documentation for new developers joining your project.
useCases.prompt: Provide a step-by-step dev onboarding doc for developers new to the codebase at [project path]. Include setup, key concepts, and first tasks.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Assess Scalability Challenges
useCases.description: Identify potential scaling and debugging bottlenecks in your system.
useCases.prompt: Which parts of this codebase at [project path] might be challenging to scale or debug? Identify potential bottlenecks and maintenance issues.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Generate Module Documentation
useCases.description: Create comprehensive README documentation for specific modules or components.
useCases.prompt: Generate a README section for the [module name] module at [file path] explaining what it does and how to use it.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Document Dependencies and Tools
useCases.description: Get a comprehensive overview of all tools and libraries used in your project.
useCases.prompt: Which tools, libraries, and dependencies are used in this project at [project path]? Create a summary with versions and purposes.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Plan Migration Strategy
useCases.description: Create a comprehensive plan for migrating your codebase to newer technologies.
useCases.prompt: Help me migrate this codebase at [project path] to the latest version of [technology]. Start with a detailed migration plan and identify potential issues.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Create Git History Presentation
useCases.description: Generate visual presentations of your team's recent development activity.
useCases.prompt: Make me a slide deck showing the git history from the last 7 days at [project path], grouped by feature and team member.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Build GitHub Issues Dashboard
useCases.description: Create a real-time dashboard for tracking and displaying GitHub issues.
useCases.prompt: Make a full-screen web app for a wall display to show our most interacted-with GitHub issues from [repository]. Include real-time updates and visual indicators.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Set Up Smart Backups
useCases.description: Create automated backup system for your important files with simple conversation.
useCases.prompt:
Help me set up a smart backup system for my work:

Scan my Desktop and Documents folders to identify my active projects
Create a 'Backups' folder structure with dated subfolders
Set up a backup script that:

Creates daily backups with clear date labels
Maintains a full history (no automatic deletion)
Organizes backups by date: Year/Month/Day structure
Tracks storage usage in the log file
Excludes temp files and node_modules


Show me how to run this with a simple 'backup now' command
Create a backup log file that tracks what was backed up and when

Start by analyzing my current folder structure and suggest what should be included in regular backups
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Find Error Patterns in Logs
useCases.description: Analyze log files to identify and summarize system issues.
useCases.prompt: Find all log files with errors in the last 24 hours at [log directory] and summarize the patterns.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Compare Config Files to Baseline
useCases.description: Detect configuration drift by comparing current configs to standards.
useCases.prompt: Compare all config files in [directory] against baseline and report any differences that might cause issues.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Update My CV/Resume
useCases.description: Quickly update your resume with new experience/skills.
useCases.prompt: Find my resume file in [folder], update my work experience section with [new job details], and save both the original and updated versions. Open the new file when you are done.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Remove Background from Profile Picture
useCases.description: Get headshot without background for Linkedin or any other use.
useCases.prompt: Find my profile picture [file name] at [file location]. Remove the background from this picture and save it as a PNG with transparent background. Open the new picture when you are done.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Merge Two PDFs
useCases.description: Combine multiple PDF documents into one file.
useCases.prompt: Find files named [filenames] in my [folder]. Merge these two PDF files into a single document. Keep the original files and create a new merged version. Open the new file when you are done.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Convert HEIC to PNG
useCases.description: Convert iPhone standard photo file type into universal PNG format.
useCases.prompt: Look for the file called 'filename' in my [folder]. Convert its HEIC format to PNG format. Keep the original file and create converted version. Open the folder with photos when you are done.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Convert EDOC to DOC
useCases.description: Convert electronically signed documents on your computer.
useCases.prompt: Find this file: [file name and/or location]. Convert this EDOC file to a standard DOC format that I can edit in Microsoft Word. Open the file when you are done.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Create folder with images
useCases.description: Teach how to use Claude to create files and automate simple workflows.
useCases.prompt: Create a new folder on my Desktop and put there 2 cat images. Open the folder when you are done.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Batch Convert and Rename Images
useCases.description: Process multiple images with format conversion and intelligent renaming.
useCases.prompt: Convert all the images in this directory [folder path] to PNG format, and rename them to use dates from the EXIF data.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Organize PDF Invoices by Date
useCases.description: Automatically sort and organize PDF documents by dates extracted from their content.
useCases.prompt: Organize my PDF invoices in [folder path] by month of expenditure. Read the invoice dates and create monthly folders.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Extract Data from PDFs
useCases.description: Pull key information from PDF documents into structured format.
useCases.prompt: Extract all data from these PDFs in [folder path]. Get the numbers, dates, and key information into a spreadsheet format.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Rename Bank Statements by Account
useCases.description: Fix messy financial document naming with intelligent renaming.
useCases.prompt: Rename all bank statements in [folder] to include account type and date range instead of random attachment names.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Find Large Receipts by Vendor
useCases.description: Locate and organize high-value receipts for expense tracking.
useCases.prompt: Find all receipts over $500 in [folder] and organize them by vendor for tax preparation.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Consolidate Data Files into One
useCases.description: Extract and standardize data for analysis.
useCases.prompt: Combine all Excel/CSV files in [folder] that have [customer data] and merge them into one standardized spreadsheet.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Remove Duplicate Contacts from Spreadsheet
useCases.description: Clean up your contact lists by automatically identifying and removing duplicate entries.
useCases.prompt: Remove all duplicate contacts from my spreadsheet at [file path]. Keep the most complete record when duplicates are found.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Find All TODO Comments
useCases.description: Locate and report all TODO items across your entire codebase.
useCases.prompt: Find all TODO comments across all projects in [directory] and create a prioritized report of technical debt.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Generate Tests for Missing Coverage
useCases.description: Create test files for modules that lack proper testing.
useCases.prompt: Create test files for every module in [project path] that's missing test coverage.
useCases.author: DC team

useCases.title: Analyze Code Complexity
useCases.description: Identify overly complex code that needs refactoring.
useCases.prompt: Analyze code complexity across all [language] files in [project path] and highlight areas that need simplification.
useCases.author: DC team

metadata.source: Excel sync script with stable IDs
